Banner.Description: I have 2 years of experience developing systems, interfaces, bots, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and sometimes in Java applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 2 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with Spring Boot and NoSql. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Root Nursery (E-Commerce) | Wordpress
Description: ROOT NURSERY is a website designed primarily for use in the plant ordering system.
This system will allow live plant related different category and different plant product.
The live plant-delivery should be timely, convenient and comprehensive. live plant delivery web site has easy features.
This project really enhance our knowledge about real time website and the Information online plant ordering system.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend.
Creating platforms with Angular, NestJS, programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Automation of processes with data structures.
Design layout with SCSS, Bootstrap, Materialize, etc.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Angular Developer
Description: Responsible for the development and maintenance of Angular-based web applications. Utilized Angular, RxJS, and other related technologies to build responsive and dynamic user interfaces.
Implemented RxJS to facilitate real-time data handling and event-driven architecture. Employed observables and operators for efficient data flow and seamless communication between components.
Developed comprehensive unit tests using Angular testing frameworks like Jasmine and Karma. Automated testing processes to ensure code quality and reliability, enabling faster development cycles.
Implementation of continuous integration and daily backups.

Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams to define project requirements and ensure alignment with business goals. Actively participated in planning meetings and reported on development progress.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
